channel.title: Death Knight dies 2 times!
channel.description: #### As physician, i ressed the Prince to Death Knight, he died Night 1. 3 night later, game says he was found dead in the castle, again! #### Of course, Death Knight dont "Die again" after rotting ends. #### Steps to reproduce: 1- Res a BD target 2- Wait 3 days 3- His body appears dead in the castle for second time #### Comments: All i can say is: Proof here: 1- Prince is dead, so i res him ![20180104145801_1|690x388](upload://kZcfNVemJf59uJlglwKZgaWY2E7.jpg) 2- He dies again 3 days after! ![20180104145743_1|690x388](upload://tGR77PjFtBTH3S8VAUIlzzWodGO.jpg) My logs: output_log.txt (440,6 KB)

item.title: Death Knight dies 2 times!
item.dc:creator: Cuatrolan
item.description:
As physician, i ressed the Prince to Death Knight, he died Night 1.

3 night later, game says he was found dead in the castle, again!

Of course, Death Knight dont “Die again” after rotting ends.

Steps to reproduce:

1- Res a BD target
2- Wait 3 days
3- His body appears dead in the castle for second time

Comments:

All i can say is: Proof here:

1- Prince is dead, so i res him

2- He dies again 3 days after!

My logs:
output_log.txt (440,6 KB)

Read full topic
